attributes.title: APP WILL MAKE YOUR PHONE EXPLODE
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to obviously learn more about the cheeto but it made my phone go crazy!!!!!!!!!! I was getting endless spam calls, texts and emails to the point where I needed to get a new phone 😱😱 if you’re like me and have been struggling with unemployment and unqualified for stimulus, don’t download this to save money!!

attributes.title: Tiktok being taken down
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app things started getting crazy. 1st I realized our president is an orange that can’t spell his name correctly 😦! 2nd I found out our president wants to marry his daughter but even worse our president of the US isn’t an orange it’s an apricot 😯! Their is no words that describe how bad trump and this app is

attributes.title: don’t use this app✨
attributes.review: this app was honestly so annoying it took two hours just for it to download. This app also drains my battery so much. It makes my phone glitch for no reason even when I’m not using the app. the flaws for this app are endless. Don’t waste your time with this.

attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: Hi. I’m writing this review because I am fed up with trying to understand how to work it. You need better explanation and I honestly don’t understand what the point are for. As a president it’s funny how you have a whole dang app just for your cult followers. Grow up and start doing your job correctly little baby.

attributes.title: THE ORANGE EGG THAT GAVE ME NIGHTMARES 😿😔
attributes.review: i downloaded to SUPPORT OUR orange fat egg but the app took 4 hours to download and kept glitching and had a picture of the orange fat egg shaped human so it gave me nightmares 😔😿chile anyways now i go to therapy and can’t get rid of these nightmares of the orange egg and like my phone was also glitching 😔it’s a very terrible app and should not exist period (the orange egg shouldn’t exist either) 😜🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: trump is a COMMIE
attributes.review: This app is the worst. WHY DO YOU NEED MY PHONE NUMBER???!! What kind of app is this?!!! Was looking forward to voting for Mr. Trump this fall, but unfortunately he has lost my vote because he’s a communist. I will now vote for Biden because a vote for any other party (including writing in Kanye) is a vote for Mr. Trump, and there is no way I’m going to let a communist into office again, not if I can help it. Sad!

attributes.title: To much orange
attributes.review: First off I just wanna say how un helpful this app is. Not only does it randomly take me to a picture of a really orange man with a toupee every 2 min I’m on the app it’s just so unorganized even if I could just have time to explore the app I wouldn’t even be able to find anything. Worst app I’ve ever seen in my entire life. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: Russians
attributes.review: I’m pretty sure the The Russians can see me through my camera when i use this app! I opened it up to learn more about my president so I could see if i still wanted to vote for him this election and I heard an accent that sounded a lot like Russian. Please make sure they can’t see into my camera or hack my phone. I DON’T WANT ANY RUSSIANS INVADING MY PRIVACY OR SHARING MY PICTURES OR ANYTHING ELSE THAT’S ON MY PHONE!!

attributes.title: His fans are very hateful
attributes.review: I had went to one of his rallies and I’d head got corona for not wearing a mask and everybody was just sneezing coughing on me and the app unsafe and it asked for my location and everything I felt like you should use email and it said of your phone number because then they can track you
attributes.userName: I do not like this boy

attributes.title: Trumpy dumpy
attributes.review: Ewww!!! I heard on social media that trump had s*x with a bowl of spaghetti! Weirdo right??!!! The app updates very rarely and when they update it is usually like one paragraph about random things. The app is also very confusing to find important info so might as well leave a bad review, and find your info about trump somewhere else
